column4: what is in the ecryptfs home directory when it is not overlay mounted. there should be a directory with the configuration. perhaps something needs to be updated there
ahh, so the config file is in the unencrypted folder itself?
modern ecryptfs is supposed to be configured so that backup up $HOME and restoring it should work. so all configs should be in $HOME
/path/to/homedir/.ecryptfs/Private.mnt      just had to change the path to that and it worked.  Thank you very much for pointing me in the  right direction.
